ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the Annotations API to create Text, Line, Box, LineArrow and Custom Annotations in Xaml.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
An introduction to the UIElement Annotations API, which allows WPF UIElements to be placed over the chart at specific X and Y data-values.
[b]Annotation Types Include:[/b]
- [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.AxisMarkerAnnotation.html']AxisMarkerAnnotation[/url] - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.BoxAnnotation.html']BoxAnnotation[/url] - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.CompositeAnnotation.html']CompositeAnnotation[/url] - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.CustomAnnotation.html']CustomAnnotation[/url] - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.HorizontalLineAnnotation.html']HorizontalLineAnnotation[/url] - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.LineAnnotation.html']LineAnnotation[/url] - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.LineArrowAnnotation.html']LineArrowAnnotation[/url] - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.TextAnnotation.html']TextAnnotation[/url] - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.VerticalLineAnnotation.html']VerticalLineAnnotation[/url]
